description: This file defines a React Native component `RecipeCard` and a sub-component `MetaPill`. It renders a card displaying recipe information including image, title, time, calories, and rating, with styling and interaction logic.

methods.name: RecipeCard
methods.description: Functional component rendering a touchable recipe card with metadata.

methods.name: MetaPill
methods.description: Inline component rendering a styled label (pill) for recipe metadata.
